mapper.sql: id, transformer_code as transformerCode, transformer_name as transformerName, model, rated_capacity as ratedCapacity, line_id as lineId, line_name as lineName, transformer_type as transformerType, primary_voltage as primaryVoltage, secondary_voltage as secondaryVoltage, manufacturer, install_date as installDate, maintenance_records as maintenanceRecords, address, remark, company, create_time as createTime, create_by as createBy, update_time as updateTime, update_by as updateBy, is_deleted as isDeleted
mapper.insert: insert into t_transformerInfo( id, transformer_code, transformer_name, model, rated_capacity, line_id, line_name, transformer_type, primary_voltage, secondary_voltage, manufacturer, install_date, maintenance_records, address, remark, company, create_time, create_by ) values ( #{id}, #{transformerCode}, #{transformerName}, #{model}, #{ratedCapacity}, #{lineId}, #{lineName}, #{transformerType}, #{primaryVoltage}, #{secondaryVoltage}, #{manufacturer}, #{installDate}, #{maintenanceRecords}, #{address}, #{remark}, #{company}, now(), #{createBy} )
mapper.update:
update t_transformerInfo set
transformer_code = #{transformerCode},
transformer_name = #{transformerName},
model = #{model},
rated_capacity = #{ratedCapacity},
line_id = #{lineId},
line_name = #{lineName},
transformer_type = #{transformerType},
primary_voltage = #{primaryVoltage},
secondary_voltage = #{secondaryVoltage},
manufacturer = #{manufacturer},
